00036 import VetPet.Menu.*;
00037 
00038 public abstract class MenuCommand
00039 {
00040         private MenuCommand next;                       // successor in the chain
00041         private String name;
00042 
00043         public MenuCommand(String menuText)
00044         {
00045                 name = menuText;
00046         }
00047 
00051         public void addCommand(MenuCommand aCommand)
00052         {
00053                 if (next!=null)
00054                         next.addCommand(aCommand);
00055                 else
00056                         next = aCommand;
00057         }
00058 
00064         public boolean execute(int count, Console input) throws Exception
00065         {
00066                 count--;
00067                 if (count == 0)
00068                         return executeImpl(input);
00069                 else
00070                 {
00071                         if (next == null)
00072                         {
00073                                 System.out.println("Unknown command");
00074                         }
00075                         else
00076                                 return next.execute(count, input);
00077                 }
00078                 return true;
00079         }
00080 
00082         public MenuCommand getNext()
00083         {
00084                 return next;
00085         }
00086 
00088         public String getName()
00089         {
00090                 return name;
00091         }
00092 
00097         public abstract boolean executeImpl(Console input)  throws Exception;
00098 }
